messages.subject: Apology
messages.msgSnippet: I m sorry, everyone. In my rush out the door I received that email message about the alleged truth behind the Hitokiri Battousai s existence, and did not
messages.messageBody:
I'm sorry, everyone. In my rush out the door I received that email message
about the alleged truth behind the Hitokiri Battousai's existence, and did
not bother to read through it carefully. As a historian-in-training, this is
a true shame on me, and for that, I humbly ask your forgiveness. I'll try
not to be so stupid from now on.

--M.
